sneckomod:SnekBite.NAME: Snek Bite
sneckomod:SnekBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Muddle !M! random card in your hand.
sneckomod:SnekBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Muddle !M! random cards in your hand.

sneckomod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
sneckomod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Muddle your hand.

sneckomod:SoulDraw.NAME: Soul Draw
sneckomod:SoulDraw.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 0 - !M! cards. NL Muddle them.

sneckomod:SoulRoll.NAME: Soul Roll
sneckomod:SoulRoll.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand.
sneckomod:SoulRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

sneckomod:PerplexingStare.NAME: Perplexing Stare
sneckomod:PerplexingStare.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain between -3 and !M! Strength.

sneckomod:SnekBeam.NAME: Snek Beam
sneckomod:SnekBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unknown cards in your deck.

sneckomod:Nope.NAME: Nope
sneckomod:Nope.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Replace it with a random card of the same type with a randomized cost.
sneckomod:Nope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Replace it with a random card of the same type with a randomized cost. NL Draw 1 card.

sneckomod:SoulCleanse.NAME: Soul Cleanse
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. NL Reduce the cost of a random 3-cost card in your hand to 0. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. NL Reduce the cost of a random 3-cost card in your hand to 0. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SoulExchange.NAME: Soul Exchange
sneckomod:SoulExchange.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 1 card, then Exhaust 1 card. NL Exhaust your hand, replacing them with random cards of the Exhausted card's class.
sneckomod:SoulExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 1 card, then Exhaust 1 card. NL Exhaust your hand, replacing them with random cards of the Exhausted card's class. NL Draw 1 card.

sneckomod:CheapStock.NAME: Cheap Stock
sneckomod:CheapStock.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand by 1.
sneckomod:CheapStock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand by 1.

sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.NAME: Unlimited Rolls
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Roll to your hand with Exhaust.
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Roll+ to your hand with Exhaust.

sneckomod:MasterEye.NAME: Master Eye
sneckomod:MasterEye.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL Draw !M! additional card each turn.
sneckomod:MasterEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL Draw !M! additional cards each turn.

sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.NAME: Improvised Attack
sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random sneckomod:Offclass Attack into your hand and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.NAME: Improvised Guard
sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random sneckomod:Offclass Skill into your hand and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:QuickMove.NAME: Quick Move
sneckomod:QuickMove.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle !M! random card in your hand.
sneckomod:QuickMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle !M! random cards in your hand.

sneckomod:QuickBite.NAME: Quick Bite
sneckomod:QuickBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! - 2 cards and sneckomod:Muddle them.

sneckomod:Rotation.NAME: Rotation
sneckomod:Rotation.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard all sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Draw that many cards plus !M! and sneckomod:Muddle them.
